input_args.passage: 'Elie Wiesel – Biographical - NobelPrize.org | Mellon Professor in the Humanities at Boston University where he teaches “Literature of Memory.” Chairman of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council from ...'
input_args.claim: 'From source, we learn that Elie Wiesel is a professor in the Humanities at Boston University where he teaches “Literature of Memory.” This is corroborated by source which states that he was a professor at City College of New York (1972–76), and from 1976 he has been teaching at Boston University.'
